dublinCore.dc:title: 112 HR 3097 IH: To amend the Bridgeport Indian Colony Land Trust, Health, and Economic Development Act of 2012 to remove the restriction on class II gaming on certain land in California.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kiley introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Bridgeport Indian Colony Land Trust, Health, and Economic Development Act of 2012 to remove the restriction on class II gaming on certain land in California.

section.header: Removal of Class II gaming restriction
section.text: Section 2(d) of the Bridgeport Indian Colony Land Trust, Health, and Economic Development Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–212) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking class II gaming or; and
by striking those terms are and inserting that term is.
